article_title: How Obamacare Has Impacted The Uninsured Rate
article_text:

2. To license a Fortune cover, order reprint or e-print copies of an article or cover, or license an accolade, please contact PARS International at www.timeincreprints.com.

twitter.description: An annual survey by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) recorded the sharpest drop in uninsured adults in 2014 since the survey began in 1997. The uninsured rate among adults under...

og.description: The uninsured rate is improving, but 36 million Americans still lack health coverage.
